floatingpoint.livemetadecks
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  floatingpoint.livemetadecks.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
floatingpoint.toolkit.UI.IModel, floatingpoint.toolkit.util.IReceiver, floatingpoint.toolkit.util.ITransmitter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ControllerLiveMetaDecks
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements floatingpoint.toolkit.util.IReceiver, floatingpoint.toolkit.util.ITransmitter, floatingpoint.toolkit.UI.IModel

A midi controller. It sends midi output to all of its registered receivers and receives midi input through the IReceiver interface.

Author:
floatingpoint

public void syncViews()
Implementers should override this method and have it notify its observers that everything has changed. Then the observers will get a complete update. Implementers should override this method.
